newsArray.title: India vs Oman Live Score, Asia Cup 2025: India Aim To Continue Winning Run Ahead Of Pakistan Clash
keywords: ind vs omn live cricket score
creator: Times Now Digital
newsArray.description: India vs Oman Asia Cup 2025 Live Score: While the focus is on the India-Pakistan clash on Sunday after the dramatic events of last week, the Suryakumar Yadav-led side will play their final match in the group stage as they face Oman at the Sheikh Zayed Stadium in Abu Dhabi. The Men in Blue are unbeaten in the tournament so far, having beaten the UAE by nine wickets in their opening game at Dubai before thashing Pakistan by seven wickets at the same venue. This match will mark the first time in history that India and Oman will play each other in a senior international men's fixture.Toss: The toss will take place at 7:30 PM ISTPitch Report: The track in Abu Dhabi has been relatively better for batting so farWeather Report: It is an extremely hot day in Abu Dhabi with a maximum temperature of 36 and a minimum of 31 degrees celcius. India Likely XI: Abhishek Sharma, Shubman Gill, Suryakumar Yadav (c), Tilak Varma, Sanju Samson (wk), Shivam Dube, Hardik Pandya, Axar Patel, Kuldeep Yadav, Harshit Rana, Arshdeep SinghUAE Likely XI: Aamir Kaleem, Jatinder Singh (c), Hammad Mirza, Vinayak Shukla (wk), Wasim Ali, Hassnain Shah, Shah Faisal, Aryan Bisht, Shakeel Ahmed, Samay Shrivastava, Jiten RamanandiIndia Squad: Abhishek Sharma, Shubman Gill, Suryakumar Yadav(c), Tilak Varma, Sanju Samson(w), Shivam Dube, Hardik Pandya, Axar Patel, Kuldeep Yadav, Jasprit Bumrah, Varun Chakaravarthy, Jitesh Sharma, Rinku Singh, Arshdeep Singh, Harshit RanaUAE Squad: Aamir Kaleem, Jatinder Singh(c), Hammad Mirza, Vinayak Shukla(w), Wasim Ali, Hassnain Shah, Shah Faisal, Jiten Ramanandi, Aryan Bisht, Shakeel Ahmed, Samay Shrivastava, Mohammad Nadeem, Sufyan Mehmood, Karan Sonavale, Ashish Odedara, Mohammad Imran, Zikria Islam, Nadeem Khan, Sufyan YousafFollow Live Updates From India vs Oman Asia Cup 2025 here:
